tagline: A comprehensive library for generating differences between two strings in multiple formats (unified, side by side HTML etc). Based on the difflib implementation in Python
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Php-diff
body:
# PHP Diff Class #

## Introduction ##

A comprehensive library for generating differences between
two hashable objects (strings or arrays). Generated differences can be
rendered in all of the standard formats including:
 * Unified
 * Context
 * Inline HTML
 * Side by Side HTML

The logic behind the core of the diff engine (ie, the sequence matcher)
is primarily based on the Python difflib package. The reason for doing
so is primarily because of its high degree of accuracy.

## This Fork ##
The goal of this fork is to refactoring the existing code in order to load classes using the autoload function for frameworks like symfony.
